ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We wish to acknowledge useful discussions with Francis Wamonje, Trisna Tungadi, Alex Murphy, Niels Groen, Ana Bravo‐Cazar, and Adrienne Pate of the Virology Group, Department of Plant Sciences, Cambridge; Andrew Craig and Eleftherios Avramidis of the Epidemiology Group, Department of Plant Sciences, Cambridge; Valentine Aritua and Warren Arinaitwe of CIAT Uganda. NJC thanks Michael Jeger, Imperial College London, for useful discussions. We gratefully acknowledge funding from the UK Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council and Global Challenges Research Fund (BB/J011762/1 and BB/P023223/1), as well as Leverhulme Trust grants F/09 741F and RPG‐2012‐667.
